text: Helmut Rohde (9 November 1925 â€“ 16 April 2016) was a German, journalist, academic, and politician of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD). He was born in Hanover. He served as Federal Minister of Education and Science from 1974 to 1978. Rohde was also a member of the Bundestag and the European Parliament. Rohde died in Bonn, aged 90. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:German academics Category:German journalists Category:Education ministers of Germany Category:MEPs for Germany Category:Writers from Hanover Category:Politicians from Hanover Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Helmut Rohde
